trans-unit.source: Specifies processing rules or option settings for a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Angir behandlingen av regler eller innstillingene for en <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"> </xref> implementering.

trans-unit.source: By default, an initialized XamlReaderSettings object uses values for its properties that correspond to expected defaults, such as `false` for Boolean properties or null values for reference-type properties.
trans-unit.target: Som standard bruker objektets initialisert XamlReaderSettings verdier for egenskapene som tilsvarer forventet som standard, `false` for boolske egenskaper eller null-verdier for referansetypen egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Default initialization results in the following values: - The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.BaseUri%2A> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.LocalAssembly%2A> properties are `null`.
trans-unit.target: Initialisering av standard fører til følgende verdier: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.BaseUri%2A>og <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.LocalAssembly%2A>egenskapene `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.LocalAssembly%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.BaseUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.IgnoreUidsOnPropertyElements%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.IgnoreUidsOnPropertyElements%2A>Egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.IgnoreUidsOnPropertyElements%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.ProvideLineInfo%2A> property is `false` in the object model; however, it can be set to `true` at run time based on the loaded executables and their debug settings, or by XAML schema context.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.ProvideLineInfo%2A>Egenskapen `false` i objektmodellen; den kan settes `true` ved kjøretid basert på den innlastede kjørbare filer og feilsøkingsinnstillinger eller av XAML skjemaet kontekst.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings.ProvideLineInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about initialization of a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings> default instance, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om initialisering av en <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings>standard forekomsten, kan du se <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings"></xref> class based on values in another <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings"> </xref> klassen basert på verdier i en annen <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This constructor supports the merging of settings for XAML readers where additional settings can also come from other participants in the reader process.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren støtter sammenslåing av innstillinger for XAML lesere der tilleggsinnstillinger kan også gå fra andre deltakere i leseren prosessen.

trans-unit.source: An existing <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En eksisterende <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReaderSettings"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the root object may include members that have a protected code access model when it reports the XAML type representation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om root-objektet kan inneholde medlemmer som har en beskyttet kode Tilgangsmodell når den rapporterer XAML typen representasjonen.

trans-unit.source: This setting is relevant to some XAML implementations such as WPF where the root object is often a "factory" for generating an instance from a pattern type, when that pattern type is not always a practical object instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne innstillingen er relevante for enkelte XAML implementeringer som WPF der root-objektet er ofte en "fabrikk" for å generere en forekomst fra typen mønsteret når denne mønstertypen ikke er alltid en praktisk objektforekomst.

trans-unit.source: For example, a root of `UserControl` has a certain meaning for WPF and Silverlight application models, and `UserControl` might have protected properties (`UserControl.Content`) that the parser needs access to.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel et rotsertifikat `UserControl` har en bestemt betydning for WPF og Silverlight programmet modeller, og `UserControl` kan ha beskyttet egenskaper (`UserControl.Content`) parseren trenger tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: Tools and design surfaces also need access to such properties.
trans-unit.target: Verktøy og design overflater må også tilgang til slike egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: These cases should generally be reported to the XAML type system as writable properties even though they have protected access in the backing type system.
trans-unit.target: Disse tilfellene må vanligvis rapporteres til XAML typen systemet som skrivbar egenskaper selv om de har beskyttet tilgang i sikkerhetskopiering typen systemet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the root object may include members that have a protected code access model; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om root-objektet kan inneholde medlemmer som har en beskyttet kode tilgang-modell. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI that is used to resolve relative paths.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir basis-URIEN som brukes til å løse relative baner.

trans-unit.source: Some URI-related properties in the .NET Framework XAML Services API treat URIs for XAML namespaces as strings; however, this property uses the true <xref:System.Uri> type.
trans-unit.target: Noen URI-relaterte egenskaper i .NET Framework XAML Services API behandle URIer for XAML navneområder som strenger; egenskapen bruker imidlertid sanne <xref:System.Uri>type.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The base URI to use.
trans-unit.target: Basis-URIEN til å bruke.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the XAML reader should ignore values for <xref uid="langword_csharp_x:Uid" name="x:Uid" href=""></xref> attributes that exist on property elements.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om XAML leseren skal ignorere verdier for <xref uid="langword_csharp_x:Uid" name="x:Uid" href=""> </xref> attributter som finnes på egenskapen elementer.

trans-unit.source: During localization, the `x:Uid` attribute is used to identify elements in markup so that localization tools can process XAML elements as discrete entities for localization.
trans-unit.target: Under lokalisering, den `x:Uid` attributtet brukes til å identifisere elementer i markup slik at lokalisering verktøy kan behandle XAML elementer som diskret enheter for lokalisering.

trans-unit.source: Attributes do not usually appear on property elements in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Attributter vises vanligvis ikke på egenskapen elementer i XAML.

trans-unit.source: However, `x:Uid` is an exception because some usages put localized text in a property element as content, instead of as a separate object that can receive its own `x:Uid`.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid `x:Uid` er et unntak fordi noen bruksområder legge lokalisert tekst i en egenskapselement som innhold, i stedet for en egen objekter som kan ha sin egen `x:Uid`.

trans-unit.source: Setting an IgnoreUidsOnPropertyElements value to `true` enables a stricter mode.
trans-unit.target: Angi en verdi for IgnoreUidsOnPropertyElements `true` aktiverer en strengere modus.

trans-unit.source: The default value of `false` continues to process property element `x:Uid` attributes.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for `false` fortsetter å behandle egenskapselement `x:Uid` attributter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader should ignore values for <xref uid="langword_csharp_x:Uid" name="x:Uid" href=""></xref> attributes on property elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis leseren skal ignorere verdier for <xref uid="langword_csharp_x:Uid" name="x:Uid" href=""> </xref> attributter for egenskapen elementer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the reader should process <xref uid="langword_csharp_x:Uid" name="x:Uid" href=""></xref> attributes on property elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Hvis leseren skal behandle <xref uid="langword_csharp_x:Uid" name="x:Uid" href=""> </xref> attributter for egenskapen elementer.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that represents the current local assembly for processing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir objektet som representerer gjeldende lokale samlingen for behandling.

trans-unit.source: This assembly information is used for calls to helper APIs such as <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllMembers%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingsinformasjon brukes til kall til helper API-er for eksempel <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllMembers%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: A CLR reflection <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> object.
trans-unit.target: En CLR-gjenspeiling <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>objektet.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the reader can provide line number and position.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om leseren kan gi linjenummer og posisjon.

trans-unit.source: ProvideLineInfo is `false` in the object model; however, it can be set to `true` at run time based on the loaded executables and their debug settings.
trans-unit.target: ProvideLineInfo er `false` i objektmodellen; den kan settes `true` ved kjøretid basert på den innlastede kjørbare filer og deres feilsøkingsinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader can provide line number and position information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis leseren kan gi linjenummer og Plasser informasjon. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the reader enforces that all <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> nodes are processed as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om leseren fremtvinger som alle <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""> </xref> noder behandles som en <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> type.

trans-unit.source: In addition to <xref:System.String>, a possible `Value` content under some XAML implementations is <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData>.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til <xref:System.String>, en mulig `Value` under noen implementeringer XAML-innholdet er <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader enforces that only <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> is contained in <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> nodes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis leseren fremtvinger som bare <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> ligger i <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""> </xref> noder; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
